attributes.action: Can slow moving car drivers  who stay permanently in the middle lane of Motorways be banned from using motorways
attributes.additional_details:
Can something please be done about car drivers  who hog the middle lane of motorways, even though vehicles in the inside (left)  lane is travelling faster than they are?

Can they be ordered to  re-take  both the theory  and practical driving tests  before they are permitted to use motorways again?
